document_data.title: Farewell to Fee
document_data.author: [[Ed Greenwood]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Farewell to Fee''' is a short unpublished story by [[Ed Greenwood]] released in July 2024 as a special reward for Ed Greenwood's [https://www.patreon.com/EdGreenwood Patreon page].
document_data.Summary: The story took place in the {{YearlinkName|1390}}, recoding the final moments of Queen [[Filfaeril Obarskyr]]'s life.
